subtasks.title: Set Up Database Migrations
subtasks.description: Create and configure database migrations for all models
subtasks.details:
Generate initial migration, set up migration scripts, create seed data, implement rollback functionality, add migration to CI/CD pipeline
<info added on 2025-08-08T01:31:40.023Z>
Prisma connection error P1010 encountered during migration setup. Database and schema exist with successful psql connection, but Prisma client initialization failing. NextAuth Prisma adapter configured but experiencing connection issues. Troubleshooting steps needed:
- Verify DATABASE_URL environment variable format and credentials
- Check Prisma schema matches existing database structure
- Validate PostgreSQL user permissions
- Consider direct schema push instead of migrations
- Review Prisma connection pooling settings
- Test connection with prisma db pull command
Migration scripts and CI/CD pipeline integration pending resolution of connection issues.
</info added on 2025-08-08T01:31:40.023Z>
<info added on 2025-08-08T07:48:51.428Z>
Migration implementation blocked due to Prisma connection error P1010. Local PostgreSQL configuration appears to be the root cause, as direct psql connections are successful but Prisma client fails to initialize. Issue has been escalated and will be tracked separately to unblock dependent tasks. Current workaround: proceeding with subsequent tasks while infrastructure team investigates connection issues. Migration scripts and database schema changes will be applied once connection problems are resolved.
</info added on 2025-08-08T07:48:51.428Z>
<info added on 2025-08-09T14:54:40.859Z>
Proceeding with manual schema management due to persistent Prisma P1010 connection error on macOS. Root cause identified as local PostgreSQL permissions conflict with Prisma client, despite successful direct pg client connections. Alternative approach implemented:

1. Retaining existing manually created database schema and SQL scripts
2. Creating version-controlled migration files directly in SQL format
3. Implementing seed data scripts using native PostgreSQL commands
4. Adding migration and seed scripts to CI/CD pipeline using psql
5. Documenting schema changes in SQL files under /db/migrations directory

This approach maintains schema version control and deployment automation while bypassing the Prisma migration tooling issues. Manual schema and migration management will continue until Prisma connection issues are resolved in a future infrastructure update.
</info added on 2025-08-09T14:54:40.859Z>
<info added on 2025-08-09T15:07:54.635Z>
Manual migration system fully implemented and operational. SQL migration files and seed scripts successfully integrated into CI/CD pipeline. All database operations working correctly through native PostgreSQL client, including schema versioning, data seeding, and rollback capabilities. Migration files properly version-controlled in /db/migrations directory. NextAuth continues to function with JWT sessions, though Prisma adapter remains disabled due to unresolved P1010 connection error. Current setup provides stable database management workflow while maintaining compatibility with existing authentication system. Infrastructure team continuing investigation of Prisma client initialization issues for future resolution.
</info added on 2025-08-09T15:07:54.635Z>

1. Test Environment Setup:

3. Dashboard Functionality:

6. Performance Testing:

- Check response times for all operations

7. Security Testing:
- Verify CSRF protection
- Test rate limiting

- Validate data encryption

8. Integration Testing:

9. Cross-browser/Platform Testing:
